Uses of Package
org.dyn4j.geometry.decompose

  • Packages that use org.dyn4j.geometry.decompose 
    Package Description
    org.dyn4j.geometry.decompose
    This package contains algorithms to decompose polygons into Convex pieces.
  • Classes in org.dyn4j.geometry.decompose used by org.dyn4j.geometry.decompose 
    Class and Description
    Decomposer
    Represents an algorithm to decompose a given list of points representing a polygon into a list of convex pieces.
    DoublyConnectedEdgeList
    Highly specialized DCEL class used to store vertices of a simple polygon and then be used to create and store triangulations and convex decompositions.
    DoublyConnectedEdgeList.Face
    Represents a face in the Doubly-Connected Edge List.
    DoublyConnectedEdgeList.HalfEdge
    Represents a half edge of the Doubly-Connected Edge List.
    DoublyConnectedEdgeList.Vertex
    Represents a node in the Doubly-Connected Edge List.
    EarClipping.Vertex
    Node class for a vertex within the simple polygon.
    MonotoneChain.Type
    Enumeration of monotone chain types.
    MonotonePolygon
    Represents a monotone polygon.
    MonotonePolygon.Type
    Enumeration of the types of monotone polygons supported.
    MonotoneVertex
    Represents a vertex of a monotone polygon.
    SweepLine.Edge
    Represents an edge of a polygon storing the next and previous edges and the vertices that make up this edge.
    SweepLine.EdgeBinaryTree
    Class to extend the BinarySearchTree to add a method for finding the SweepLine.Edge closest to a given SweepLine.Vertex.
    SweepLine.Vertex
    Represents a vertex on a polygon that stores information about the left and right edges and left and right vertices.
    SweepLine.Vertex.Type
    Enumeration of the SweepLine.Vertex types.
